trans-unit.source: Exposes the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> subtree for the data items in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TabControl"></xref> to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Przedstawia <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> poddrzewo dla elementów danych w <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TabControl"> </xref> do [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: When data items are shown in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)], the system creates a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> subtree for the data items.
trans-unit.target: Gdy elementy danych są wyświetlane w [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)], system tworzy <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>poddrzewo dla elementów danych.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: The system also creates an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer> for each data item.
When the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] for the data item is created, this TabItemWrapperAutomationPeer is also created.
trans-unit.target: Gdy [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] do elementu danych jest utworzony, tworzona jest również to TabItemWrapperAutomationPeer.

trans-unit.source: The two peers then merge to form a single peer.
trans-unit.target: Dwa elementy równorzędne następnie Scal z formularza pojedynczego elementu równorzędnego.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TabItemWrapperAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TabItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TabItemWrapperAutomationPeer"></xref>.
